title: About Us
subtitle: Who We Are
intro: Scholar Nepal Pvt. Ltd. is a multidisciplinary research and consulting firm established in 2071 B.S. We are dedicated to providing high-quality professional services in the fields of engineering, planning, environment, and social development. Our team comprises experts from various disciplines working together to deliver sustainable solutions.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To contribute to national development by providing reliable research, innovative planning, and technical expertise to government and non-government organizations.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be a center of excellence in research, development planning, and engineering consultancy in Nepal.

objectives.title: Our Objectives
items: Conduct high-quality socio-economic and environmental research.
Provide technical assistance in engineering survey, design, and estimation.
Support local governments in periodic planning and capacity development.
Facilitate social accountability through public hearings and social audits.
